name: Pomeranian
body:
### Pomeranian
A simple, themeable [Pomodoro Timer](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomodoro_Technique) for Linux and eventually Windows.

### What you need
Pomeranian requires
* A recent version of Python.
* Vala-0.16 or better.
* GCC
* Development packages for:
  * Glib (>= 2.32)
  * GTK+-3.0 (>= 3.4)
  * GStreamer (>= 0.10)
  * libgee
  * libcanberra and the GTK interoperability packages.

### Getting it
On the command line type:

`git clone git://github.com/llamadonica/pomeranian.git`

### Compiling
On the command line type:

`./waf configure build`

`sudo ./waf install`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A pomodoro timer written in Vala
